The Cessna family comprises of light aircraft and a business jet.

In-Game

The Citation has 220+ units in circulation, most likely because of its range for its small size. It is then followed by the Caravan at 60+ units and then the 421 at 30+ units.

Specs

Cessna Aircraft Specs (Real-life)
421[1] Caravan[2] Citation X[3]
Length 11.09 m (36 ft 5 in) 11.46 m (37 ft 7 in) 22.04 m (72 ft 4 in)
Height 3.49 m (11 ft 5 in) 4.52 m (14 ft 11 in) 5.85 m (19 ft 2 in)
Wingspan 12.53 m (41 ft 2 in) 15.87 m (52 ft 1 in) 5.85 m (63 ft 7 in)
Engine Continental GTSIO-520-L Pratt & Whitney Canada PT6A-114A Rolls-Royce AE3007C/C1

Trivia

  • At one point, there was a user who had bought (at least) 1,563 Cessna 421s. They would be banned later on for a different reason, and all of those 421s would be cleared by an administrator. It is unknown why the user bought all of those (that would be worth $859.650,000!).[4]
  • The Citation family of aircraft includes 12 variants, the Citation X being the 7th to start production.
